channel.title: [317] Serenity-PK Returns to the world that we know....Release D: [317]
channel.description:
Server Download Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=65fdc90963c9869261d4646c62b381cbe04e75f6e8ebb871 Don't annoy me for bluur's cilent link. Use the search bar on finding how to de configure the server from bluurs. I used it so don't come crying saying you don't know how.
Haro I'm Serenity.
Right as of now I'm starting on the devolution pking source that was released since I thought the pking was so amazing I'd quit my server anyway and start programming this source since it's simply a true piece of work :P.
Yeah yeah I thought the server was pretty decent but it seems people on the server are too damn lazy to train since the exp rate was 500 lol... -Westscape Source - Added customs specs. -Fixed the whip emote -Fixed Random Dying anti leech delta put in - Added a skilling area is on Ape Atoll/ Ghorrock teleport - I did a lot of things I personally don't remember... - If you think I leeched then your really retarded because 1. Go through to cilent.java and compare it to Westscape's. 2. If you still think it's leeched then WOW lol. I personally don't care if you leech at all. I am a bit new to programming so I would prefer constructive criticism. Heres some blah blah blah. I'm the creator of Serenity-PK
The Cilent for this server is Noobscape's Cilent. Also If you don't know how to de configure it from bluur's cilent I congratulate you on being a retard.
Things I forgot to take pictures of are -Full Crafting -Full Smithing -Full Runecrafting -Full Woodcuting -Full Herblore -Full Prayer -Full Mining -Admins cannot do ::pickup ::copy whatsoever only ::mute ::ipmute ::banuser ::ipbanuser They are exactly like regular players just they enforce the laws :). -50 Percent Slayer -Server has full security -King Black Dragon -Full Barrows Minigame -PK Following
Lastly, The Pictures... [IMG]http://i41.photobucket.com/albums/e292/2001170/Serenity-PK/Agility.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i41.photobucket.com/albums/e292/2001170/Serenity-PK/Ancients.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.photobucket.com/albums/e292/2001170/Serenity-PK/ArmadylGS.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i41.photobucket.com/albums/e292/2001170/Serenity-PK/BGSSpec.jpg[/img] item.dc:creator: @xpressmusic xpressmusic
item.description:
@xpressmusic wrote:

[quote=“wtfry, post:1, topic:288899”]Eh in the Noobscape client there was no gui.java… So I can’t change the ip to connect to my server and how could I change
the “Noobscape” to my server name, it’s not in Frame_Sub1 and couldn’t be in qui.java since I don’t have gui.java only gui.class.[/quote]

Dude… Use bluurrs client, get models and class8 from noobscape client! thats it >.<[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2009, 02:00:57 am[/size][hr]Duel arena is so fucked up! No wilderness levels! Everything is great bout those 2 things…
